Initializer# init(_:in:)

iOS 8.0+iPadOS 8.0+Mac Catalyst 8.0+macOS 10.10+tvOS 9.0+visionOS 1.0+watchOS 2.0+

```
init?(
    _ range: NSRange,
    in string: String
)
```

Available when `Bound` is `String.Index`.## [See Also](/documentation/swift/range/init(_:in:)-5cclx#see-also)

### [Converting Ranges](/documentation/swift/range/init(_:in:)-5cclx#Converting-Ranges)

[`func relative<C>(to: C) -> Range<Bound>`](/documentation/swift/range/relative(to:))Returns the range of indices described by this range expression within the given collection.[`init?<S>(NSRange, in: S)`](/documentation/swift/range/init(_:in:)-5qfor)
